glsa.title: CouchDB: Denial of Service
glsa.synopsis: A vulnerability in CouchDB could result in Denial of Service.

background.p: Apache CouchDB is a distributed, fault-tolerant and schema-free document-oriented database.

description.p: CouchDB does not properly sanitize the count parameter for Universally Unique Identifiers (UUID) requests.

impact.p: A remote attacker could send a specially crafted request to CouchDB, possibly resulting in a Denial of Service condition.
